title: Chomsky on AI in 2020 #shorts #chomsky #interview #linguistics #ai
description:
This conversation between Noam Chomsky and Aria Razfar took place in December, 2020 as a follow-up to "The Origin of Language: Findings from Linguistics, Mathematics, and Mysticism" Conference that took place at the HUB Foundation in Pleasanton, California. They touched upon many topics including AI, Evolution, and Chomsky's father. 
Clips from the interview can be found @LinguisticJourneys.
